publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3879 Ian McKee: Earthquake in Central Italy—That the Parliament expresses its deep condolences and sympathy for the terrible loss of life and devastation following the earthquake that struck the Abruzzo region of Italy in the early hours of 6 April 2009, killing adults and children and causing considerable damage to the medieval city of L’Aquila and surrounding villages and leaving tens of thousands of people homeless; congratulates the rescue services, including the Italian Red Cross, for its crucial search for life, and asks the Presiding Officer, on behalf of the Parliament, to send his condolences to the Italian Consulate General in Edinburgh. Supported by: Des McNulty*, Bill Butler*, Rob Gibson*, Patricia Ferguson*, Jackie Baillie*, Ken Macintosh*, John Park*, Christopher Harvie*, Aileen Campbell*, Sandra White*, Bob Doris*, Liam McArthur*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Patrick Harvie*, Jamie Hepburn*, Bill Kidd*, Helen Eadie*, Elaine Smith*, Kenneth Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Stuart McMillan*, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-3879 Earthquake in Central Italy (lodged on 6 April 2009) Robin Harper*
S3M-3879 Earthquake in Central Italy (lodged on 6 April 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3879 Earthquake in Central Italy (lodged on 6 April 2009) Hugh Henry*
S3M-3879 Earthquake in Central Italy (lodged on 6 April 2009) Sarah Boyack*
